daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Recent updates in New York City include a Legionella scare in a Yorkville co-op, critical injuries from a pedestrian accident in Brooklyn, and the implementation of a new tipping transparency law expected to return $550 million to workers. Additionally, a guilty plea was entered by an Indian national for plotting an assassination in NYC.
